title: Best Strategy For Udyr Right Now?
body: Would it be Tiger or Phoenix, I dont play udyr but I like the look of him{{champion:77}}

replies.body: if you get sated, phoenix is probably the best

Pheonix = AoE clearing/damage
Tiger = Single target clearing/damage

What do you need?
trick2g mains him, hes a streamer and hes really good on udyr. unfortunately hes the most toxic streamer, so much that he actually makes me cringe
Depends where you are playing him and what you want to achieve. I do like Tiger but Phoenix is the best for jungle clear.
